programmes.show_description: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it!
Explore stylish fashion with Ruth Langsford and spread the cost in 4, interest-free. Discover classic basics, vibrant prints and effortlessly chic styles. Tune in and transform your look today!
Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.
Rieker offers footwear designed to be flexible, roomy, light and well cushioned. Following trends in the marketplace, Rieker provides classic footwear to women of all ages.
Tune in and discover trendy fashion with Izabel London. Whether you're shopping for a holiday, wedding or your daily wardrobe, we'll be showcasing pieces that'll help you feel your fashionable best.
Harness the beauty of pearls with the Lara Pearls Collection, offering stunning jewellery set with elegant pearls for over 20 years. Discover a piece for your jewellery box or a loved one's today.
Refresh your style with Vero Moda! Discover on-trend pieces and must-have essentials to elevate your wardrobe for every season. Tune in for effortless fashion inspiration.
Every item in this stunning selection of gold jewellery contains rare Welsh gold from the Clogau St David's Gold Mine - the mine that has provided gold for Royal wedding rings.
Refresh your wardrobe with Denim & Co's spring fashion. Discover stylish, easy-to-wear pieces perfect for the season's fresh start.
Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.
Unveil your chic side with Sosandar! Discover flattering, trendy designs created for real life with longer lengths and unique styles to make you feel sexy, feminine, and confident.

Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too!
Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.
Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.
Discover the latest trends from the biggest fashion brands with a little help from QVC presenter, Katy.
Tune in to see the modern and sophisticated Finery London womenswear range, with a focus on stylish detail and beautiful fabrics to make sure your wardrobe reflects your individuality.
Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.
Easy care, easy wear, easy elegance in this mix and match collection of unique and versatile pieces created for the smart, elegant, busy women seeking comfort that doesn't compromise style.
